page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: This is a survey of the parents of various pupils in Myers Grove School. Their main types of employment are : MEN: Primary = 0%,Secondary = 22% Tertiary = 74%,Unemployed = 4% Only 4% of men work part-time.10% were engineers,8% were steelworkers and 6% were bus drivers. WOMEN: Primary = 0%,Secondary = 4% Tertiary = 82% and 14% were housewives(hardest task of all). 72% of the women worked part-time and 28% worked full-time.16% were secretaries,12% were cleaners,10% were school dinner ladies,8% were shop assistants and 6% were nurses. There were 15 different types of jobs for women and 30 types for men. Primary jobs =obtaining raw materials. Secondary jobs =manufacturing industry Tertiary jobs =service industries.
